author: QSKSw
title: The best construction game of all time, other than Rock Raiders!
review:
Disclaimer: I was 14 when I wrote this. I'm 21 now. I still haven't figured out any of those things.

The best construction game of all time, other than Rock Raiders! The houses! The screaming babies! The getting new parts during the holidays! I just need to figure out the 2 player mode, and how to get a path onto the post office, what the yellow tunnels are for, and how to get some of the stuff in the picture on the box.

author: PCGamer97
title: An okay game.
review: This is not one of my favorite games, only for the fact I just never got into it. It got boring after awhile. :/ But the building experience is very nice because you get a nice selection of railroad tracks, buildings, train carts, and scenery pieces. It was very playable too, I haven't had any problems with the game. You may like this game, I didn't so much.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Video Games/PC) - LEGO Loco Review
review:
The game is good but it could have been a lot better. You're able to create your own city and add a train if you want to. What I don't like about this game is that you have to wait a little bit after you've brought to life.

Pros

  • You can create your own city
  • You can bring your city to life

Cons

  • You have to wait if you want to see the first minifigs walking around your city
  • Voice of the minifigs could be annoying

Summary

All in all it's a great game to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.

author: Brickman_oo_
title: AMAZING GAME.
review: This is one of the best lego games EVER. It is very creative and fun. You can build a town, drive trains though it, send letters, and much much more. This may sound boring, but it is better than the new lego games. I really suggest you find this game on the internet and get it.
